          "properties": {
            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "#mydiv {\n  background-image: url(img_1.png), /* top image */\n                    url(img_2.png), /* middle image */\n                    url(img_3.png); /* bottom image */\n  background-position: right bottom,\n                       left top,\n                       right top;\n  background-repeat: no-repeat,\n                     repeat,\n                     no-repeat;\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 1
        }
      },
